name: Joan
info: A Sinner who is adept at Magic Output. Reduces targets' Magic Resistance by 5% with each mark of [Marcato] for 10 seconds, up to 6 stacks.
criminalRecord:
Trespassed into the backstage of a concert, intentionally damaged show equipment, illegally occupied the performance venue, caused provocative destruction amid the crowd, incited disorder and chaos, and initiated a stampede which resulted in massive equipment damage.

--

The subject has admitted to vandalism and assault without hesitation, but the public is still biased toward her, thinking of her rebellious acts as a demonstration of the //rock and roll spirit//. Some even think the real culprit of the incident should in fact be //their record label who has stolen their music//.

The higher officials have judged the concert stampede case closed. The subject has never shown any severe violent tendency during her detention in the MBCC. For now, the case can be considered solved.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The music played by the subject has a powerful stunning effect and is not limited by the type of instrument used. Powered, the music can induce adverse reactions such as nausea, vomiting and dizziness in the audience.

+++* Awakening Signs
Awakened during the concert incident a few years ago. The trigger is believed to be the subject's intense emotional fluctuations during the concert, but the precise cause is still to be determined.

+++* Corruption State
The subject is in the incubation period of awakening. No apparent signs detected so far and all indicators appear normal. The abnormal and rebellious behavior is due to the subject's career in rock music and not related to mental corruption.
ecbFlavourText:
"Take a good look, you dream-forsaking bastard!"
"This is what Anavrin's music is supposed to sound like! This is what we used to be!"
arrestRec1: The Public Security Bureau received reports of a drunken brawl, discovered the involved person's Sinner identity, and transferred the case to the MBCC. As the subject was still drunk at the time, the arrest went smoothly.
arrestRec2: The subject grew up in a town on the outskirts of Eastside and has parents who belong to the ordinary working class. A fan of the DisCity's rock culture since childhood, the subject went to the prosperous city center of Eastside alone at sixteen to pursue her music dream. Since leaving home, the subject has rare contact with parents.
arrestRec3: The subject was the guitarist of DisCity's most famous underground band, Anavrin. But after the band's vocalist got shot by a gun during a performance, Anavrin disbanded and became a forgotten legend. Later the subject moved to Syndicate and continued to pursue a career in music as a solo musician.
arrestRec4: Only two months after the vocalist's murder, the former bassist of Anavrin signed a new contract with Quinn Entertainment, held a concert in the name of a new Anavrin, and rearranged the former band's original songs to make them more pop. These actions enraged the subject and are believed to be the core reasons for the subject's sabotage of the concert.
servingTerm1: Repeatedly sends requests to the MBCC's logistics department for a venue to run //rehearsals//. Considering the foreseeable noise it'll cause, the logistics department always refuses to process requests of this sort.
servingTerm2: The subject doesn't show much talent in singing and is even overshadowed by certain amateur Sinners. The subject is however unaware of the fact and often starts humming unidentified tunes out of the blue, resulting in frequent complaints.
servingTerm3: Despite not being able to hold liquor, the subject is eloquent and never runs out of stories to tell, and so has known a few drinking buddies within the Bureau. Essentially treating the canteen as a bar, the subject needs only to order a cosmopolitan with lime on the rocks and can then chat away the whole day with other Sinners.
servingTerm4: The subject has a pretty solid fan base within the MBCC and the fans have even started a fan club. By the subject's request, the fan number 00001 title has been reserved for the Chief, which comes with the privilege to give song requests for a live guitar solo performance.
emotionCheck1:
[Joan is looking at pictures of the previous concert. Something's troubling her.]

**Joan:** When will this life come to an end? I want to be performing on a stage somewhere.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Things should get better after a while.
 * **Joan:** Sigh... I guess I'll have to find a way to entertain myself for a while.
 * **Joan:** ğŸ˜

* **Prompt:** Then I'm counting on you to find me the best spot.
 * **Joan:** Ha. Just wait until you see me flourish on the stage.
 * **Joan:** ğŸ˜
emotionCheck2:
[You hear singing voices from Joan's room]

**Joan:** Come as you are--


**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** As you were...
 * **Joan:** Chief, your taste is... admirable.
 * **Joan:** ğŸ˜‰

* **Prompt:** Keep it down. Some staff can't take it anymore.
 * **Joan:** I wouldn't have to practice here if the sports ground wasn't available.
 * **Joan:** ğŸ˜“
supervision1:
++* âš  A Special Day

//Today is a special day.//

**System Notifications:** Today is the anniversary of Anavrin's lead singer's death. After seeing the band's documentary film on TV, Joan went silent and started drinking alone in the corner of the room. Traumatized, she seems lonely.

* **Prompt:** Sit by her side for a bit
supervision2:
++* âš  Intrusive Fan

//Some people are fighting again in the Outdoor Activity Area.//

**System Notifications:** Joan beat up the Sinner, an obsessive fan of hers, who tried to sneak into her room and steal her personal belongings.

* **Prompt:** Don't get too crazy with your idol, folks.
supervision3:
++* âš  New Gear

//Joan seems to be following Chief everywhere lately.//

**System Notifications:** Joan added a set of dazzling rainbow strings to her guitar. She is now drawing more attention than ever.

* **Prompt:** Take another look
supervision4:
++* âš  Special Show

//There is a special show in the Recreation Area today.//

**System Notifications:** Joan kept asking and pleading, so you had no choice but to approve her nostalgic rock music concert. The employees gather and hug, singing along while crying tears of joy as they recollect the fond memories of their past youth.

* **Prompt:** Wipe away your tears quietly
supervision5:
++* âš âš  New Song

//Joan asks you to give her new song a title.//

**System Notifications:** Having received another noise complaint, you go to Joan's room to check on her.

**Joan:** Oh, Chief, good timing. Check out this melody.

**System Notifications:** Joan plays some music for you with the guitar she's holding.

**Joan:** What do you think? This is the beginning of my new song, but I kinda got stuck after that.

**Joan:** Sometimes, giving a song a title makes writing the rest of it easier.

**Joan:** So. After hearing that melody, what do you think this song should be called?

* **Prompt:** Venomous Kiss of the Red Snake
 * **Joan:** Hmm, a bit cheesy, but still a pretty good title.
 * **Joan:** Right, that's it. I can feel it now! Listen to this...
 * **System Notifications:** You and Joan begin writing the song together and you completely forget about the noise complaint.

* **Prompt:** Baa Baa Little Lamb
 * **Joan:** Is that supposed to be a joke, Chief? Baa Baa Little Lamb?
 * **Joan:** Hold on, sometimes a completely irrelevant title can bring an unexpected effect.
 * **Joan:** Baa Baa Little Lamb... It does sound a bit cult. How about following it with this melody?
 * **System Notifications:** You and Joan begin writing the song together and you completely forget about the noise complaint.
supervision6:
++* âš âš  Work and Rock

//Joan has expressed her opinions on the music you play in your office.//

**System Notifications:** Joan walks into your office.

**Joan:** Hey, Chief. I admit you have okay taste in music. But don't you get bored looping the same songs in the office all the time?

**Joan:** Here, try these songs I've picked for you. I'm sure you'll get hyped up right away.

**System Notifications:** Deafening rock music echoes in the entire office.

**Joan:** How is it? Powerful, isn't it? This is real music! This is rock & roll!

**System Notifications:** You begin grooving to the rhythm of the music and you don't feel like working anymore.

**Joan:** Right, that's it! Embrace that rhythm in your heart!

* **Prompt:** Join Joan

**System Notifications:** You join Joan and the two of you continue feeling the power of rock together.

**System Notifications:** Three hours later, you're working after hours under Nightingale's supervision to finish what you shoved aside in the afternoon.

**Chief:** Rock is definitely not the best background music for working...
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Hmph. Finally found me. It's fine. As long as the guitar is still here, anywhere will do.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Yes, that's it! Quick, give me a paper and pen! A new tune came to me, I need to jot it down!

[Raise to Phase 3]
I can wow the audience even with a harp.

[Level Start]
Go, Krist.

[Win Battles]
Done.

[Lose Battles]
What a **** performance.

[Ultimate Skill]
Solo time!

[Die in Battles]
Can't even... get into... a 27-year-old club... hahaha...

[Greeting]
Good timing. Let me hear your demo.

[Conversation 1]
As long as I'm still alive, those record companies can fuck off. No way in hell would I let them steal Anavrin's songs.

[Conversation 2]
My favorite food? Coffee with milk, and strawberry cake... what did you expect? You thought I could live on alcohol alone?

[Conversation 3]
My dad always used to say that God blessed me with musical talent so I wouldn't take the wrong path... Haha, pity I don't believe in God, nor did I choose the right path.

[Special Conversation 1]
Back then, our lead singer would always holler about burning this city to ashes. Ironically, he became the first of the bunch to burn to ashes.

[Special Conversation 2]
Maybe because it happened so long ago, but I don't hate her so much anymore. As long as she stops plotting against Anavrin, she can do whatever she wants. I won't stop her anymore.

[Special Conversation 3]
When this is all over... If that day comes, I want to keep on performing. Of course, I'll leave you a front row seat. Don't you dare not show up.

[Full Compliance]
In the past few years, all I had was this guitar. Now... I don't want to sound corny, but thank you for being by my side.

[Idle]
â™ª But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo. What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here. â™ª

**Trivia:** Music from Radiohead's song, "Creep"

[Annoyed]
Get lost!

[Special Attention]
Of course I care about the audience, but don't wag your finger at me and bullshit before the song is even finished. Got it?

[Dispatch]
Perfect! I can meet some old friends on the way.

[Dispatch Complete]
â™ª Come as you are, as you were, as I want you to be â™ª

**Trivia:** Music from Nirvana's song, "Come as you are"

[Level Up]
New riff, not bad.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Best Concert in History
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When an enemy marked with [Marcato] dies, Joan deals (300%/350%/400% of Attack Damage) Magic Damage to all enemies within the grid and attach them with 1 [Marcato] stack.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Take a good look, you dream-forsaking bastard!"
"This is what Anavrin's music is supposed to sound like! This is what we used to be!"

crimebrandSets.name: energy set
crimebrandSets.note: Standard set to increase energy generation.

crimebrandSets.name: Boss Burst
crimebrandSets.note: Increase damage dealt when enemies are corebroken. Good for BFL and TOA.

crimebrandSets.name: Team Buff
crimebrandSets.note: Increase the team's damage when she ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Alternative
crimebrandSets.note: A very cheap alternative for if you have no other option available.

shackles.title: Forte
shackles.description: Joan will stun an enemy for 2 seconds each time they receive a [Marcato] mark for the 6th time.

shackles.title: Chord
shackles.description: [Resonance Effect] The required number of times for [Marcato] marks is now 2.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Chord
skills.description: Joan performs a 3-hit attack with music from her guitar. The 1st and 2nd hits: Joan deals (70% of Attack damage) Magic Damage.The 3rd hit: Joan deals (50% of Attack damage) Magic Damage 3 times.

upgrade.description: The $0st and $0nd hit damage multiplier is increased to $0% , and the $0rd hit damage multiplier is increased to $0%.

skills.name: Marcato Frenzy
skills.description: Joan plays the hottest guitar solo, gaining a 30% Attack Speed bonus for 10 seconds. She also attaches [Marcato] to all enemies within range 6 times.

skills.name: Resonance Effect
skills.description: Every 3 times an enemy is attached with [Marcato], [Resonance Effect] is triggered and Joan deals (250% of Attack damage) Magic Damage to the enemy.

skills.name: Triple Chord
skills.description: When [Chord] hits an enemy, there's a 10% chance that [Marcato] is added to the enemy 1 time.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +5
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Requirements: Dispatch Joan 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Joan's Shackle Sync Rate increased to 5
Unlock Voice: Obedience Full, Thunder Aftermath
